data.name: Mod Components
data.description: Used to craft weapon mods. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Moss
data.description: Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

data.name: Motor
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

guide_links.label: Where to Get Motors in ARC Raiders

data.name: Mushroom
data.description: Can be consumed to regain a small amount of health.

data.name: Music Album
data.description: Perfect for relaxing nights at home, casual get-togethers, and private air and guitar concerts.

data.name: Music Box
data.description: Worth a small fortune.

data.name: Muzzle Brake I
data.description: Slightly reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.

data.name: Muzzle Brake II
data.description: Moderately reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Anvil, Arpeggio, Burletta, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Venator, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest

data.name: Muzzle Brake II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Muzzle Brake II

data.name: Muzzle Brake III
data.description: Significantly reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Anvil, Arpeggio, Burletta, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Venator, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest

data.flavor_text: 25% Reduced Vertical Recoil Control - 25% Reduced Horizontal Recoil Control

data.name: Muzzle Brake III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Muzzle Brake III

data.name: Noisemaker
data.description: A deployable proximity sensor that sounds an alarm when enemy raiders are detected.

data.name: Number Plate
data.description: Can be recycled into metal parts.

data.name: Oil
data.description: Used to craft weapons and explosives. Can be recycled into chemicals.

data.name: Olives
data.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

data.name: Orange Camo (Origin Outfit)
data.description: Orange camo color is unlocked for completing The Trifecta quest.

data.name: Osprey Blueprint
data.description: Has reliable damage output and accuracy.

data.name: Osprey I
data.description: A scoped bolt-action sniper rifle with reliable damage output and accuracy.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.description: Significantly improves stability.
data.flavor_text: 15% Reduced Horizontal Recoil - 30% Reduced ADS Speed

data.name: Painted Box
data.description: May be worth a few coins.

data.name: Patrol Car Key
data.description: Unlocks the rear door of a patrol car

data.name: Patrol (Outfit)
data.description: Rewarded for maintaining at least  a Daredevil I rank in the trials until the season ends.

data.name: Photoelectric Cloak
data.description: A gadget that allows the user to conceal themselves from ARC.

data.name: Pilgrim's Peak Security Code
data.description: Temporary security code to unlock the main gate.
data.flavor_text: Can only be used during Locked Gate

data.name: Plastic Parts
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

data.name: Playing Cards
data.description: Speranzans love to see who can build the tallest tower - before the tremors knock them down.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Poster of Natural Wonder
data.description: If you stand close and squint your eyes, it's like the world never came crumbling down.
